title: Person of Interest ''RAM'' - Mr. Dillinger vs Mr. Reese
author: YT.POI
comment: "Attracting a lot of attention shouting like that" and "You just lost possession of your client" were the most badass lines of the episode

I think my favorite part in this episode is when Dillinger is talking about "two people across the street," and it's John and Kara. Alternatively, they (John and Kara), both know about Dillinger and Kara says "I have a Christmas list of ways to kill him." It's just so interesting! This was a really good episode.
this cold blooded and intelligent reese is rhe one i like
Can we all agree that everyone was brilliant? Including the direction screenplay and music? And let's not forget Nolan himself 😍
Did Reese ever figure out just how much Finch had spied on him? He knew Finch had his sights on him, but for how long and what he knew
